Acknowledgements:
We thank Terry J. Sacket and Courtney Rogers and the rest of the DBIC (Dartmouth Brain Imaging Center) personnel for assistance in data collection, and Yaroslav O. Halchenko for helping to prepare this BIDS dataset.
Special thanks go to Kay Robbins for assistance with HED tags annotations.

This project was supported by NIBIB:R01EB026549-03 from the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering (NIBIB).
EthicsApprovals: The institutional review board of Dartmouth College approved the study (CPHS STUDY00031937: Spatial Topology 31937), and all participants provided written consent.
